title: Mary Prince on enslavement - point of view

content.question: Slave narratives written by Black women often relied on which of the following to demonstrate the unique vulnerabilities experienced by their authors?

choices.label: Examples of facing abuse and violence
Examples of working long hours in the fields on plantations
Examples of serving as leaders in wars
Examples of working as religious leaders on plantations

content.answer: Examples of facing abuse and violence

topic.text: 2.22: Gender and Resistance in Slave Narratives

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
